Nifty Introduction Demonstration

20 Jan 2008

Well, this took quite some time, but now it is finished and boah, I tell you IT ROCKS! An Introduction to Nifty written in Nifty! :)</a>

It explains Layout, Effects and Interaction with Nifty and how it all links together. So don't wait any longer and check out the Nifty introduction webstart</a>.

And because you probably can't wait any longer after you've seen all this, you can download the first alpha version of Nifty to try it all out by yourself! This is the "complete" Package with all dependent Jar-Files packages in a single Jar. So you don't need any additional files (Note: A different Nifty-only Version will be available soon too). Required is a Java 1.5.

And in case you are curious how the introduction works you can take a look at the complete xml-file</a> of the introduction.

nifty-0.2-complete.jar</a>

:)

Download .zip file
